# @zonedigital/prettier-config

[![Part of Zone Frontend][zone-fe-image]][zone-fe-url] [![npm][npm-image]][npm-url] [![downloads][downloads-image]][npm-url]

[zone-fe-image]: https://img.shields.io/badge/-frontend-lightgrey.svg?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&longCache=true&style=flat-square&colorA=2C2B39&colorB=1010E5
[zone-fe-url]: https://github.com/zone/frontend
[npm-image]: https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@zonedigital/prettier-config.svg?style=flat-square
[npm-url]: https://npmjs.org/package/@zonedigital/prettier-config
[downloads-image]: https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/@zonedigital/prettier-config.svg?style=flat-square

This package provides Zone's Prettier config.

## Installation

`npm i @zonedigital/prettier-config`

## Usage

Add the following to your `package.json`. If you need to extend the config, see [the Prettier documentation](https://prettier.io/docs/en/configuration.html#sharing-configurations) for more details.

```javascript
{
  "prettier": "@zonedigital/prettier-config"
}
```
